place an army down in an empty continent or less then two armies in the continent.

Prompts the user to select a territory on which to place an army

During the start of the game, choose a territory in which to claim, then place remaining armies.
placeArmy() - Method in class model.SimpleAIPlayer
At the beginning of the game, randomly chooses empty territories to place an army in.

Player - Class in model
Abstract class to represent players in the game of Risk.
Player() - Constructor for class model.Player
